thread.title: Live coverage: Boise State 17, Colorado State 0 (second quarter)
thread.title_full: Live coverage: Boise State 17, Colorado State 0 (second quarter)

author: ccripe@idahostatesman.com (Chadd Cripe)
title: Live coverage: Boise State 17, Colorado State 0 (second quarter)
text:
xxx 
Quick hits 
The Broncos wore blue pants, white jerseys and blue helmets. ... The single-game captains were linebacker Ben Weaver and tight end Holden Huff. ... Nickel Chanceller James carried the Hammer. ... Boise State won the coin toss and deferred. ... It was 84 degrees at kickoff. ... Boise State’s Donte Deayon returned a punt 67 yards in the first quarter. The play was completely wiped out by a holding call on defensive end Jabril Frazier. ... 
• • • 
Our coverage plan is a little different this year. I’ll be spending 100 percent of my time on our live/digital coverage of the game — so I’ll be even more active than usual updating this blog and interacting with fans on Facebook and Twitter (@IDS_BroncoBeat). 
Late in the game, we’ll be collecting fans’ brief takeaways from the game. We’ll run the best ones in Sunday’s paper and in the blog post with my takeaways from the game. To participate, tweet with the hashtag #bsutake, respond to the Facebook post soliciting opinions or email sports@idahostatesman.com. 
• • •
